About the Company: NK Industries Limited is one of the largest manufacturer and exporter of castor oil and its derivatives in India since more than two decades. With state of the art manufacturing plant, its factory is equipped with oil decanters, vertical continuous solvent extraction plant, continuous oil refining, energy-efficient hydrogenous plant, and quality fatty acid production plant. It was incorporated as NK Oil Mills Pvt Ltd. in 1987 and converted into Public Limited Company in 1992.
